mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COM_ERROR_LOG (OCCURRED_AT, TRACE_ID, STATUS, ERROR_CODE, MESSAGE, PATH, HTTP_METHOD, QUERY_STRING, HEADERS_JSON, BODY_TEXT, STACKTRACE) VALUES (#{occurredAt}, #{traceId}, #{status}, #{errorCode}, #{message}, #{path}, #{httpMethod}, #{queryString}, #{headersJson}, #{bodyText}, #{stacktrace})
